# Window Cleaning App - Project Setup Complete

## Project Overview
React application for window cleaning business management with customer lists and workload tracking, integrated with Supabase database.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created
- [x] Get project setup information
- [x] Scaffold the Project (React + Vite)
- [x] Customize the Project (Add Supabase integration and business components)
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Successfully Created!

Your window cleaning app is now running at http://localhost:5173

### Next Steps:
1. Set up your Supabase account at https://supabase.com
2. Create a new project and get your credentials
3. Copy `.env.example` to `.env` and add your Supabase URL and key
4. Run the SQL commands from README.md to create database tables
5. Start managing your customers and workload!
